xaringanthemer: Xaringan CSS Theme Generator

Source: R/xaringanthemer-package.R
xaringanthemer-package.Rd

Create and edit your xaringan CSS files from within your R R Markdown slide source. More technically, this package actually creates valid remarkjs CSS themes that are easily used by xarangan.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/gadenbuie/xaringanthemer

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/gadenbuie/xaringanthemer/issues
